task.title: Define Directory Records
task.abstract: Staff users can refine the pool of data based on the business need by setting criteria. The records in the directory can be filtered based by active badge assignments (Accounts and Contacts) and/or filter selection.

step.cmd: Select Badge Type in the Directory Criteria drop-down list. The Select Badge Type button is displayed.

Click on the Select BadgeType button to open the Select Badge Type modal. Drag and drop the Available Badge Types from the left to the Selected Badge Type list on the left. Once the first selection is made, the Save button is displayed to your selections can be saved. Note: Only Account or Contact records with the selected Badge will be included in the directory. To remove a badge, drag the badge back from right to left. Click Save.
Select Filter Criteria in the Directory Criteria drop-down list. The Select Filter Criteria button is displayed.
Click on Select Filter Criteria button.
Select the Field and operator. Enter required criteria and click Save.
step.info: Avoid selecting text area and lookup fields. These fields are not intended for filtering. Date fields and identifiers are also an issue.
